port.description: Specify the remote partner port.

usePasswordExpr.description: Specify whether to have password expressions or not.

transferProfile.description: Transfer profile entity for synchrony site.

siteTemplate.description: The site template of the site

clientCertificate.description: The client certificate ID used for mutual authentication.

name.description: Site name

port.description: Site port

username.description: The username of the site used for authentication.

password.description: The password of the site used for authentication.

clientLocalCertificate.description: The client local certificate of the site.

publicKeys.description: The public key used in test connection.

dmz.description: The network zone of the site.

socketTimeout.description: The maximum number of seconds the server waits to read a block of data from the partner server, or write a block of data to the partner server.

verifyFinger.description: Indicates if fingerprint verification of the site is enabled.

tcpNoDelay.description: Disable/Enable Nagle's algorithm) for the transfer.

allowedMacs.description: The allowed message authentication code algorithms used to confirm that the message came from the stated sender.

socketBufferSize.description: The size of the receive buffer in bytes used from the socket opened during the transfer.

socketSendBufferSize.description: The size of the send buffer in bytes used from the socket opened during the transfer.

cipherSuites.description: The set of cryptographic algorithms used.

keyExchangeAlgorithms.description: The set of key exchange algorithms used for connection.

fipsMode.description: Specifies whether FIPS 140-2 standard is used.

downloadFolderAdvancedExpressionEnabled.description: Specifies whether Expression Language support is enabled for download folder.

downloadPatternAdvancedExpressionEnabled.description: Specifies whether Expression Language support is enabled for download pattern.

activeMode.description: Define whether the Active Connection Mode is enabled

isSecure.description: Specify if secure protocol is used or not.

ccc.description: Clear command channel. 'true' indicates if Clear Command Channel option should be used when connecting to site, 'false' if not to be used.

tlsShutdownCcc.description: TLC Shutdown on CCC. 'true' means that the client should shutdown TLS session on 'Clear Command Channel' and 'false' that it should not shutdown the TLS session on 'Clear Command Channel'.

matchAnyLineTerminators.description: Transcode any line terminators in ASCII mode.

disableFtpHostnameVerification.description: Verify if the remote host taking part of a data connection is the same as the host to which the control connection is attached.

uploadFolderOverridable.description: Defines if the upload folder can be modified by the Send To Partner routing step.

preferredMethod.description: Specify the preferred FTP command when entering FTP passive mode.

useUri.description: Specify whether to define partner URL or not. If it's 'false', 'host' and 'port' should be specified. Otherwise 'url' should be specified.

requestMode.description: The value of the requestMode property

customProperties.description: Custom properties which are defined with "key": "value" pairs.

connectionStatus.description: Indicates whether the connection is successful

authenticationStatus.description: Indicates whether the authentication is successful

fingerprintVerificationStatus.description: If fingerprint verification is enabled in test connection

fingerprint.description: Fingerprint value used in test connection

cipher.description: Cipher suite name used in test connection

certificateAlias.description: Certificate alias used in test connection

sendBufferSize.description: Send buffer size (SO_SNDBUF) used in test connection

receiveBufferSize.description: Receive buffer size (SO_RCVBUF) used in test connection

sessionId.description: Session id associate with test connection

errorDetails.description: Detailed error message in case of error in test connection

hmac.description: Hash-based message authentication codes. These are used to ensure that the received message text is intact and unmodified.

keyAlgorithm.description: Key Algorithm used in test connection

publicKey.description: Public key used in test connection

remoteFolder.description: Remote folder used in list folder operation.

sessionId.description: Session id associate with remote list folder operation.

errorDetails.description: Detailed error message in case of error in list folder operation.

lastModifiedTime.description: The remote file last modified time.

submitScriptWithinFile.description: Specify if the script contains unicode characters and has to be submitted within a file.

sendScript.description: Send script of the Connect:Direct site template.

certificatePlaceholder.description: Speficy the site login certificate placeholder. This property should be set if 'useCertificate' is 'true'.

transferMode.description: The transfer mode of the site template.

id.description: The id of the site template.

name.description: The name of the site template.

type.description: The type of the site template. Acts as a discriminator.

protocol.description: The protocol of the site template. It could be 'cd', 'synchrony transfer' or any 'custom' one.

additionalAttributes.description:
Additional attributes which are defined with "key": "value" pairs. Keys must start with "userVars." prefix, follow the pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.]+
and have length between 10 and 255 characters (including the prefix). Non prefixed part of key should not start with "userVars.", since it is
a reserved word. Both key and value cannot be blank.

id.description: The id of the transfer profile.

name.description: The name of the transfer profile.

account.description: The account for which the transfer profile is created.

default.description: Defines whether this transfer profile is default or not.

sendMapping.description: Determines the files to send. It is either a file name (for Client Initiated Transfers only), a wildcard pattern or an EL expression.

receiveMapping.description: Determines the name of the received file. It is either a file name or an expression language pattern. The expression must not contain '*' or '?'.

fileLabelOption.description: Determines whether the file name and the path, relative to the account's home folder, are sent. Corresponds to PI 37.

multiSelect.description: Determines the files to retrieve - all files that match the specified pattern (true) or just the first one (false).

transferMode.description: The transfer mode used when advancedSettings.enabled is false.

recordFormat.description: Sets the record format of the transferred file. Can be used only when advancedSettings.enabled is false.

recordLength.description: Sets the record length of the transferred file. It must be a positive integer. Can be used only when advancedSettings.enabled is false.

sendingAcknowledgmentEnabled.description: If set to true, SecureTransport automatically acknowledges the transfer after its processing completes successfully.

paddingStripEnabled.description: Enables/disables padding character removal. Can be used only when advancedSettings.enabled is false.

additionalAttributes.description:
Additional attributes which are defined with "key": "value" pairs. Keys must start with "userVars." prefix, follow the pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.]+
and have length between 10 and 255 characters (including the prefix). Non prefixed part of key should not start with "userVars.", since it is
a reserved word. Both key and value cannot be blank.

customProperties.description: Custom properties which are defined with "key": "value" pairs.

AdvancedRoutingSubscription.description: A representation of an Advanced Routing subscription.

type.description: The type of the application. Acts as a discriminator.

maxParallelSitPulls.description: Custom attribute under which we store the option for maximum sit pulls to be executed simultaneously. Negative value or 0 - no limit, positive value 4 - limits simultaneously

folderMonitorScheduleCheck.description: Whether a folder monitor subscription is scheduled.

scheduledFolderMonitor.description: Specify if this subscription is targeted for a scheduled folder monitor.

subscriptionEncryptMode.description: Encryption that will be used for subscription folder. Accepting one of default, enabled, disabled.

fileRetentionPeriod.description: Specify the retention period of the pulled files. Must be non-negative integer between 0 and 36500.

flowAttributes.description:
Flow attributes which are defined with "key": "value" pairs. Keys must start with "userVars." prefix, follow the pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.]+
and have length between 10 and 255 characters (including the prefix). Non prefixed part of key should not start with "userVars.", since it is
a reserved word. Both key and value cannot be blank.

id.description: The id of the transfer configuration

tag.description: The tag of the transfer configuration

outbound.description: The direction of the transfer configuration. It should be false (from account to application) or true (from application to account)

transferProfile.description: The transfer profile of the transfer configuration

dataTransformations.description: The data transformations of the transfer configuration.

id.description: The id of the data transformation

type.description: The type of the data transformation.

asciiArmor.description: Specify if SecureTransport uses ASCII armor encoding. ASCII armor refers to using binary-to-text encoding for plain text data.

compressionAlgorithm.description: Specify what type of compression is used. Possible values are -1 (Preffered), 0 (No compression), 1 (ZIP), 2 (ZLIB) or 3 (BZIP2). Preferred compression methods and order of preference are determined by examining the recipient's PGP key. If the data compression method you choose is not among the recipient's preferred methods, it is possible that the recipient will not be able to access the data.

compressionLevel.description: Specify the compression level. Possible values are 2 (Fast), 5 (Normal), 7 (Good) or 9 (Best).

encryptEnabled.description: Specify if the file should be encrypted using PGP key.

localSignCertificate.description: Which PGP key should be used for signing.

originalNameExpression.description: Specify if the original encrypted file is saved to a different name, location, or both. You can use a file name expression.

originalNameExpressionEnabled.description: Specify if the original encrypted file is saved.

partnerEncryptCertificate.description: Which PGP key should be used for encryption.

requireEncryption.description: Specify if the file is required to be encrypted or the transfer will fail.

requireSignature.description: Specify if the file is required to contain a trusted signature or the transfer will fail.

signingEnabled.description: Specify if the file should be signed using PGP key.

transformedNameExpression.description: Specify if the decrypted file is saved to a different name, location or both. You can use a file name expression.

transformedNameExpressionEnabled.description: Specify if the file should be decrypted.

postClientDownloadActionType.description: Specify if Post Client Download Actions will be applied to each file successfully downloaded from the subscription folder. It can be 'DELETE' or no property at all.

postClientDownloadActionTypeFailure.description: Advanced Routing setting for post client download action type option on failure.

postClientDownloadTypeOnPermfailDoDelete.description: Defines whether to delete the file in case of a permanent failure of a post client download.

postClientDownloadTypeOnSuccessDoAdvance.description: Defines whether to trigger advanced routing in case of a successful post client download.
Defines whether to trigger advanced routing with file copy in case of a successful post client download.

postClientDownloadTypeOnFailDoAdvancedRo.description: Defines whether to trigger advanced routing in case of a failed post client download.
Defines whether to trigger advanced routing with file copy in case of a failed post client download.

ppaOnFailInDoDelete.description: Defines whether to delete the file on failure after the transmission. This action is applied to files arrived to this folder and processed by a route package.

ppaOnFailInDoMove.description: Specify a value to rename the file after transmission or move it to a different folder on failure. An expression language can be used to specify a file name/folder. This action is applied to files arrived to this folder and processed by a route package.

ppaOnSuccessInDoDelete.description: Defines whether to delete the file on success after the transmission. This action is applied to files arrived to this folder and processed by a route package.

ppaOnSuccessInDoMove.description: Specify a value to rename the file after transmission or move it to a different folder on success. An expression language can be used to specify a file name/folder. This action is applied to files arrived to this folder and processed by a route package.

moveOverwrite.description: Delete the target file and repeat the rename operation.

ptaOnSuccessInDoMoveOverwrite.description: When the "Allow Overwrite Existing File" option is enabled and the rename operation fails because the target file exists, ST will delete the target file and repeat the rename operation.

ptaOnPermfailOutDoDelete.description: Defines whether to delete the file on failure after the transmission.

ptaOnPermfailOutDoMove.description: Specify a value to rename the file after transmission or move it to a different folder on permanent failure. An expression language can be used to specify a file name/folder.

ptaOnTempfailOutDoMove.description: Specify a value to rename the file after transmission or move it to a different folder on failure. An expression language can be used to specify a file name/folder.

triggerOnConditionEnabled.description: If checked, processing of files in the subscription folder will be triggered upon a specific condition.

triggerOnConditionExpression.description: Specify the condition on which to trigger file processing. An expression language can be used.

triggerOnSuccessfulWildcardPull.description: Setting for trigger on successful wildcard pull.

submitFilterType.description:
Specify the submit filter type. It could be 'FILENAME_PATTERN' or 'TRIGGER_FILE_CONTENT'.
If 'FILENAME_PATTERN' is selected and 'submitFilenamePatternExpression' is with value '*' all files will be submitted for processing in the subscription folder.

If 'FILENAME_PATTERN' is selected and 'submitFilenamePatternExpression' is with some filename pattern, only files matching specific filename pattern will be submitted for processing.

If 'TRIGGER_FILE_CONTENT' is selected, data file names will be read from trigger file content. Each file name should be on new line. The whitespace characters before and after the file names are discarded. Also lines containing only whitespace characters are not considered as files.Trigger file format:file1.txt, file2.txt, file3.png

submitFilenamePatternExpression.description: Specify the file name pattern. An expression language can be used.

triggerFileOption.description:
Specify the trigger file option. Possible values: 'fail', 'continue' or 'retry'. This property controls the behaviour of AR processing in case not all files listed in the trigger file are available.
'fail' - AR processing should fail if any of the listed files is missing. This is the default behaviour.
'continue' - AR processing should skip the missing files and continue with the existing ones.
'retry' - if any of the files listed in the trigger file are not available, AR processing will be retried. The retry behaviour could be further configured with the 'triggerFileRetriesNumber' and 'triggerFileRetryDelay' properties.

triggerFileRetriesNumber.description:
Specify the trigger file maximum retries number. 

This option is available when 'triggerFileOption' option is set to 'retry'.

triggerFileRetryDelay.description:
Specify the interval in seconds, when next trigger file retry will be executed.

This option is available when 'triggerFileOption' option is set to 'retry'.

ciphers.description: Comma-separated list of FTP enabled ciphers.

enabledSslProtocols.description: The suite of protocols available for the FTP server. The option is ignored if FIPS mode is turned on for the FTP server (SSLv2 and SSLv3 are disabled). Possible values are : TLSv1, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2, TLSv1.3, SSLv3, SSLv2Hello. Comma-separated list.

passivePortBase.description: Passive mode base port, 0 means 'let system choose port'.

passivePortNumber.description: Passive mode port range, 0 means 'there are no port range restrictions'.

protocol.description: The server's protocol. Acts as a discriminator.

loginFormat.description: How will the client get challenged for authentication. HTML - present an HTML login form, no BA; BA - use HTTP BA; ERR - no challenge: must use config/auth agents; PREAUTH - config/auth agents + HTML login page in case of failed login.

allowedAuthenticationParameters.description: HTTP allowed authentication parameters represented as a semicolon separated list.

isHstsEnabled.description: Enable or disable HSTS for HTTP Server. On change, the HTTP server must be restart.

contentSecurityPolicy.description: Specifies the value of the Content-Security-Policy header for the HTTP server.

xssProtection.description: Specifies the value of the X-XSS-Protection header for the HTTP server. Accepted values are: 0 | 1 | 1; mode=block |1; report=<reporting url>

contentTypeOptions.description: Specifies the value of the X-Content-Type-Options header for the HTTP server. Accepted value: nosniff

referrerPolicy.description: Specifies the value of the Referrer-Policy header for the HTTP server. Accepted values are: no-referrer|no-referrer-when-downgrade|origin|origin-when-cross-origin |same-origin|strict-origin|strict-origin-when-cross-origin|unsafe-url

expectCt.description: Specifies the value of the Expect-CT header for the HTTP server. Accepted value is: max-age=<age>; enforce; report-uri=<uri>. The enforce and report-uri directives are optional.

httpSecuritySameSite.description: Specifies value for the SameSite cookie attribute for http. Valid values: None, Lax, Strict. Default value when not set: Strict.

redirectHostname.description: When set, all subsequent to first requests to the ST Web client will be bound to that hostname. This should be used in the case where a DNS switch occurs to avoid requests getting split across different nodes.

clientCertificateResolution.description: Controls the status of users client certificate SSH authentication.

clientPasswordAuth.description: Controls if password authentication is enabled as a user authentication method on the SSH server.

minDiffieHellmanGroupExchangeKeySize.description: Define the minimum key size for Diffie-Hellman exchange algorithms group supported by the current SSH server. This value is honored if Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm is defined as supported in keyExchangeAlgorithms parameter value.

publicKeys.description: Comma-separated list of supported public keys for client certificate authentication to current SSH server. This option is not honored when FIPS mode is enabled. The first entry will be set as preferred public key for authentication to SSH daemon.

allowedMacs.description: Comma-separated list of supported MAC algorithms for current SSH server. The first one will be set as preferred MAC algorithm. This option is not honored when FIPS mode is enabled.

enabled.description: Whether the reporting to Axway Sentinel is enabled.

host.description: The IP address of the remote Axway Sentinel host.

port.description: Port of the remote Axway Sentinel host.

useSecureConnection.description: Whether SecureTransport server should send messages to the Sentinel server over a secure channel.

shouldVerifyCert.description: Whether the SecureTransport server to check the validity, trust status and hostname of the certificate presented by Axway Sentinel server upon establishing connection. If it is false, connections could be established even if the certificate is expired or the certificate attributes are not correct.

fipsEnabled.description: Enables the communication between SecureTransport and Axway Sentinel in a mode that is fully compliant with FIPS 140-2. This setting overrides the AxwaySentinel.SecureConnection.Protocol and AxwaySentinel.SecureConnection.EnabledCipherSuites.

heartbeatEnabled.description: If true the SecureTransport server sends a message to the Axway Sentinel server to tell it that SecureTransport is alive and connected.

heartbeatTimeUnit.description: Time unit for the time between the heartbeat messages.

eventStates.description: Whether SecureTransport should enable the reporting of the specified events. The events are specified as properties of the eventStates object, whereas the value of the properties is one of the following strings - <true|false|required>. Available states - ACKED, AVAILABLE(ST_VAS), AVAILABLE(XFBTransfer), CANCELED, DECRYPTED, DECRYPTING, DELETED, ENCRYPTED, ENCRYPTING, ENDED_TO_ACK, ERROR, FAILED, FORWARDED, FORWARDING, INTERRUPTED, POST_PROC/ARCHIVED, POST_PROC/ICAP_DENIED, POST_PROC/ICAP_SCANNED, POST_PROC/ICAP_SCANNING, POST_PROC/ROUTED, POST_PROC/ROUTING, PRESERVED, RECEIVED, RECEIVING, RENAMED, ROUTED, SENDING, SENT, SUBMITTED, TO_EXECUTE, TO_BE_DELETED, WAITING.

mappingRules.description: The Axway Sentinel attributes where SecureTransport reports related values.

overflowFilePath.description: File path to the file where SecureTransport writes events in case it cannot connect to Axway Sentinel.

overflowFileSize.description: Maximum size of overflow file in MB.

overflowFilePolicy.description: Possible values (ignore - Stops Collecting New Events | stop - Pauses All File Transfers Sent From and Received by SecureTransport). The default value is ignore.

overflowFileThreshold.description: Represents the percent of file size at which warnings are sent.

shouldPersistLinkData.description: If true SecureTransport server will maintain link data when reporting is disabled.

certificateIssuer.description: Certificate issuer type. Acts as a discriminator.

userSSO.description: Whether sso is required for user.

requirePassword.description: Whether password is required. If set to "requiredForUserClasses" and  requirePasswordUserClasses is not specified, the value will fall back to the default.

requireCertificateForUserClasses.description: Whether certificate is required for user classes.

requirePasswordUserClasses.description: User classes for which password is required.

adminSSO.description: Whether sso is required for admin.

adminSelectedCertificates.description: List with IDs of the selected issuers.

userAuthStatus.description: Pluggable authentication status. This is a read only property.

adminAuthStatus.description: Pluggable authentication status. This is a read only property.

deleteFilesOlderThan.description: Delete files older than x days.

maximumFileSizeAllowedToArchive.description: Maximum allowed file size to archive.

isCluster.description: Define whether this a cluster environment i.e. at least one inserted node (true if in cluster environment, otherwise false).

type.description: Type of the certificate

account.description: Name of the account the certificate belongs to

generate.description:
When true, certificate would be generated.
When false, certificate must be provided as part of the body in order to be imported.

additionalAttributes.description:
Additional attributes which are defined with "key": "value" pairs. Keys must start with "userVars." prefix, follow the pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.]+
and have length between 10 and 255 characters (including the prefix). Non prefixed part of key should not start with "userVars.", since it is
a reserved word. Both key and value cannot be blank.

clusterNode.description: The cluster node on which the event is processing.

processorType.description: Defines which task processor should take care of a task.

recovered.description: Whether the event is recovered or not.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription id which event is associated with.

accountId.description: Account id which event is associated with.

lastHeartbeat.description: The last updated heartbeat timestamp in UTC for the persisted event.

status.description: Status of the delete operation for the event. Possible values "deleted", "not found".

totalCount.description: Total number of entities available on the ST server.

policy.description: This property defines which File Maintenance settings will be applied for current account or business unit.

deleteFilesDays.description: This property represents file retention period for account or business unit. All files older than the property value will be deleted.

pattern.description: This property represents file name pattern for account or business unit. All file names match of the property value will be regarded by the application.

expirationPeriod.description: If this property is set to true, the deletion of files based on file expiration period will be enabled. The file expiration period will be set as flow file attribute EXPIRE.ON.

removeFolders.description: If this property is set to true, the deletion of folders remain empty after File Maintence will be enabled.

warningNotifications.description: If this property is set to true, the warning notifications feature will be enabled.

sendSentinelAlert.description: If this property is set to true, the warning TO_BE_DELETED state will be reported to Sentinel server.

warnNotifyAccount.description: If this property is set to true, the warning notifications will be sent to account email.

warningNotificationsTemplate.description: The email template name which will be used in File Maintenance warning email notifications for account.

notifyDays.description: This property represents warning notifications period when emails will be sent to the recipients.

deletionNotifications.description: If this property is set to true, the deletion notifications feature will be enabled for the account.

deletionNotifyAccount.description: If this property is set to true, the deletion notifications will be sent to account email.

deletionNotificationsTemplate.description: The email template name which will be used in File Maintenance report email notifications for account or business unit.

policy.description: This property defines which Account Maintenance settings will be applied for current account.

daysAfterCreation.description: The criteria representing the amount of days after account creation or first maintenance job run.

daysOfInactivity.description: The criteria representing the amount of days of account inactivity.

action.description: Applicable for account. The action which should be performed when Account Maintenance criteria is met.

daysDeleteDisabled.description: Applicable for account. The sub-action criteria representing the amount of days for deletion of accounts disabled by Account Maintenance application only. It is valid if action is set to "DISABLE".

emailTemplate.description: Applicable for account. The email template name which will be used in Account Maintenance report email notifications.

notifyAccount.description: If the account matches a criteria and an action to be performed in X days or sooner, a notification mail should be sent to the email address configured for that user.

emailTemplate.description: Applicable for account. The email template name which will be used in Account Maintenance password email notifications.

notifyDays.description: The comma-separated periods for account password expiration notifications.

notifyAccount.description: If the account matches a criteria and an action to be performed in X days or sooner, a notification mail should be sent to the email address configured for that user.

emailTemplate.description: Applicable for account. The email template name which will be used in Account Maintenance certificate email notifications.

notifyDays.description: The comma-separated periods for account certificates expiration notifications.

notifyAccount.description: If the account matches a criteria and an action to be performed in X days or sooner, a notification mail should be sent to the email address configured for that user.

reportNotified.description: Report email notifications for future action.

warnNotified.description: Warning email notifications for future action.

accountDisabledDate.description: Date when account has been disabled by account retention maintenance.

accountNotified.description: Denotes whether an email has already been sent as a notification to the current account.

accountPasswordNotified.description: If the account password will expire in one of configured notification days, a notification mail will be sent to the email addresses configured for that user.

accountCertificateNotified.description: If the account certificates will expire in one of configured notification days, a notification mail will be sent to the email addresses configured for that user.

name.description: The name of the user (the login name)

authExternal.description: Tells if external authentication is enabled. It has value 'true' if the user authentication is done by an external authentication and 'false' if the user authentication is done by the ST system

lastLogin.description: The time the user last successfully logged in. It has value null if the user never successfully logged in. The time is in RFC 2822 format - EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z. Note: This property is read only property. Secure Transport server sets that property on user login.

locked.description: Test if authentication via the user login is disabled. This may be because the user has been locked or the maximum authentication attempts has been exceeded

failedAuthAttempts.description: The number of sequential failed authentication attempts

failedAuthMaximum.description: The number of failed authentication attempts allowed before authentication via the user is disabled. If not set, the value from configuration option Users.DefaultLockoutLimit will be taken. A value of 0 allows the user an unlimited number of attempts

failedSshKeyAuthAttempts.description: The number of sequential failed ssh key authentication attempts

failedSshKeyAuthMaximum.description: The number of failed ssh key authentication attempts allowed before authentication via the user is disabled. If not set, the value from configuration option Users.DefaultSshKeyLockoutLimit will be taken. A value of 0 allows the user an unlimited number of attempts

successfulAuthMaximum.description: The number of successful authentication attempts allowed within a predefined period before authentication is disabled. That period is defined globally. A value of null allows the user an unlimited number of attempts

lastFailedAuth.description: The time of the last unsuccessful authentication attempt. The time is in RFC 2822 format - EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z. Note: This property is read only property. Secure Transport server sets that property on failed user login.

lastFailedSshKeyAuth.description: The time of the last unsuccessful ssh key authentication attempt. The time is in RFC 2822 format - EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z. Note: This property is read only property. Secure Transport server sets that property on failed user login.

successfulLogins.description: The number of successful login attempts

policy.description: This property defines which Account Maintenance settings will be applied for current account.

policyModifyingAllowed.description: Whether the account under BU can have custom configuration of account time to live maintenance.

daysAfterCreation.description: The criteria representing the amount of days after account creation or first maintenance job run.

daysOfInactivity.description: The criteria representing the amount of days of account inactivity.

BadRequest.description: Bad request - server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to perform the operation.

NotFound.description: Not Found - entity with specified parameter can not be found on the ST server.

NotAcceptable.description: Not Acceptable - the server cannot produce a response matching the list of acceptable values defined in the request's headers.

UnsupportedMediaType.description: Unsupported Media Type - the server refuses to accept the request because the payload format is in an unsupported format.

Created.description: Created - the request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result of it.

UnprocessableEntity.description: Unprocessable Entity - the server understands the content type of the request entity, and the syntax of the request entity is correct, but it was unable to process the contained instructions.

MethodNotAllowed.description: Method Not Allowed - request method is not supported by the target resource.
